example.parse: (IP (IP (LCP-SBJ (NP (NN 背面)) (LC 右侧)) (VP (ADVP (AD 还)) (VP (VV 留下) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 相当于) (NP-OBJ (QP (NP (NN 钞票)) (QP (CD 五分之一))) (NP (NN 大小))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 空白)))))) (PU ，) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 让) (NP-OBJ (DP (DT 各)) (NP (NN 欧元国))) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VRD (VV 加印) (VV 上)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP (PN 各自)) (NP (NN 国家))) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VA 独特))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 标记))))))) (PU 。))
